item.text: bla bya// rgya gar skad du/ da Ar+ya aT+TamaN+Dal kan nAmam
hAyA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phag pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes
bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg chen po'i mdo// sangs/
brla@#// rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi
dge slong gi dag 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ byang chub sems dpa'
rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub se ra dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen ngo ma pham pa dang/ ngag mchog dang/ blo grong mtha' yas dang/ dri med snying po dang/ ye shes rgyal bo dang/ mtha' yas sde dang/
ye shes snang ba dang/ ye shes sgron ma dang/ shes rab snang ba dang/ tshangs pas byin dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen
bo lha'i cod pan dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dang 'chen po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa sha stag
dang ya nga thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu
'khrub// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byamasnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan
shin tu yongs bsgrags dang 'a zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me thong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ den
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang pazhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
ches kyang ston to// gshA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa//
'jig rten gyi khams mngon ra dga' bamed pa zhes bya ba yod// danadabazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pas ngas rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya
bdaltar nang bzhugs te/ 'tsho shing gnas la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bya ma snyed 'das pa na/
'jig rtan gyi ra mgashin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshugs zhes bya ba yodad/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po
zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/'tsho zhingagazhas lachos kyang ston to// shAra'i du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyad 'das
pan: 'jig rtan gyi khams rdul bral sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de nga zhen gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang ba'i dbang phyug
rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs tA/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shArA'i du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung drug
ga ba ma snyad 'das nga na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams bslu ba mad pa zhes bya ba de da de/ de nadabazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas thegs pa med nga ra zhon pa'i
dung la zhes bya bad ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston to/ shAri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rtan gyi ma
ba gang+gA'i klungangadun gyi bya ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsar gyi tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ ldan de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
cha'i pad+mal rnam par gnonang sa bzhudang zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston te// gaTha ri'i busangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rtanagyi

khams gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa ni/ 'jigarten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po cha'i

pad+ma la rang tuganas nga ri dbang rgyal pa zhes bya ngad ltar ya nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho 4 nga gzhas la chos kyang ston to// tAji'i bu de bzhin gshags nga dgra bcom pa yang dag gang ra rdzogs pa 'a sa ngas rgyas
brgyad po de dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing dal/ni ya ngas su dgapa sta/ bud med med de// snyigs ma lnga med de// shAri'i bu rigs bya du bam/ rigs kyi bu mo drug pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/
gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dbang ngamang yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad ngo de dag gi mtshan rjes nas/ lan cing 'dzan la keg cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing/
gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stenan/ shAri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mod sems canadamyal bar 'grub bam/ dud 'gro' skya gnas sam/ padags kyi yul/
lam/ lha ma man rnams kyi nang du 'grongar 'gyur ba dang gnas med de/ go skabs ma yan no// mi khom pa rnams su skye ba de'i gnas mad do// shAri'idu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
nga dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos nas/blangs shing bzungal/ ngaklogasangashing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya char
yang dag pa rarang tungashad na/ shAri'i bud bud med kyi dngosang lan gnyis lenang 'ganas de mad rung go skabs ma yin te/ de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu drag/ rigs kyi bu
bo theg pa chen re la yang dgar ra zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshags padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasade dag gi mtshan thosanas/ blangs nangabazungal/ bklags
shing kun chub par byas te/ 'gapar byas shing/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dwag nga rarab tu ston na/ del lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang/ mi mayin pa dang
rgyal po dang/ chom rkun dang/ me dang/ chudang/ dug dang/ mtshon cha las 'jigasang ma 'byung bar shes par bya'o// ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo thag pa na pol yang
dag nga ra zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de nga zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshanangarjod// nub mo srid la tul nad
bde bar gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur/ bdu b.rasadapar 'gyur zhing/ sdig pa can gyi rmi lamarlabar mi 'gyurade/ dganyid kyis legor na yang lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu/
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma thagapa chenapo la yang dag par zhugs pa gang 'a la zhig gis de bzhin gshags pa dgangatsamar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyus de dag gi mtshan brjod nas
mtshan mo derangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsom na/ 'a la ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo brag pa chanang la yang dag par
zhugs pa gang la la zhig dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ lan cing 'dzin la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug
par byed cing/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ya ngadug nga ra rab tu stonan nga 'di nas bzung sta/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shesang dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs dang bral
b.ram 'gyur/ nam yang dbang ngo ma tshangangar mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshanadang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang shesarab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar ma bgyur/ nam yang sangs rgyas dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos dang bral bar ma gyur ro// de 'di nas bzung ste nga chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar/
mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalate/ bde bar gshegs pasade skad gsungs nas/ stonapas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rtenamagon
po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams migang 'dzin byed pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun b zloganas// ring por mi thogs bde 'gror 'gro// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasamachos par byed// de yi samasani dang
bar gyur// rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// dan 'du ba'i sgo redacing/
dan rtag tu bkur bar gyur/ mtshan rnams 'di dag ga 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa byab grangs med du/ lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mchod/ myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyur gyur/ mtshan rnams
'di dag 'dzinabyed pa// denishasarab 'ama' ra 'am// blunapa'am 'on par yong mi 'gyur kun tusangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzanang/ de la lha klu
gnod sbyin dang/ gsangab lhadang lhaman rnams // nyin dang mtshand srung bar byed// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de ni gzugs mtshan du nasum tshogs// 'byor pa'i rigs su
skye 'gyur zhing// de ni sbyin pa'i bdag re ra 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin ngas// bskalar bya ba brgyamang du// de yi kha nas dra 'byung ba// dri bsung zhim po//
'byang bar 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyimtshan 'dzinapa// rdzu 'phrular zhing yid gzhungs la// 'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i rin tshan pad+mar skye bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzinabyed pa/
nga dang mdang rtsa lag dang// spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing// nam yang pho sras ra mgrang mi 'gyur// bud med kyis kyang bo ldan pa// de dag rnams kyin tshan nges na// bud med lus la yid byung
nas/ mkhas shing skyes par skye bar 'gyur// lus can kun la pan nga 'a phyir// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenagyi// rten dang sbyangs su 'byung bar 'gyur//
de la na tshon gyis ma tshugs te// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin// g.yon canadage dang chom rkun dang/ rgyal po khang nga la gnod ma byed// thung nga rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la sdig ngang
ldan ng 'i bdud/ nag nga 'i rtsa lag bzhon bcas nga sa// grags ni red par ye dang mi 'gyur/ zhing rnams bye ba bsam yas su// da namatha' las 'gro 'gyur te// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing
ngar ni// 'jig rten mgon po rnams la lta// brtanang sangs rgyas rnams ma yong nas// dad pa brtan po thob par 'gyur// de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su// mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to/
thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag/ byang chub lung bstan thosanas su// rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing// da ni dogs pa madra par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 'ad dag/
shes nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa// dan yon tan 'di dgadang// rgya cher gzhan yang los kyang thob// thub pa drang srong du gyur pa// 'di dga rnams kyi mtshan byas nas// migang mtshan rnams
'dzin byed nga// rdzu 'phrul chamakhas bsod nams 'dod// de lta bas nabadag nyid che// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thosanas// skyes bu mkhas pas gzung bya zhing// gzhan dag la ni bshad par bya//
bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsalanas/ tshe dang ldan ng ri'i bu dang/ dge slong de dgadang/ byang chub semasadapa'adi dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ dri zar bcasapa'i
'jigarten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lamangon par bstod de// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
da#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzab+hAb bkriN+Di ti nAm mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phagasapa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa' thamasecad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gdag 'dun chen po dung/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ de'i
tshargyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pon/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsar mchog 'od dang la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes labolta na sdugapa/ 'dog bzang ngo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan ng zhig
'dug sta/ bumo de yang sngon gyi dgra ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus lus kyi mdogagasar gyi kha dog lta bu r mngonang ra grub par gyur cing/ sa'i phyogs gang dag tu 'greng bu dang/ 'dug pa dang/ 'gro ba'i
sa phyogs de dag kyang/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ dus gos dmarapo bam/ dkar po'am/ gang dag gyonapar gyur pa'i gis de dag thams cad kyang/ gsar kyi
kha dog lta bu nyid du snang ngo/ bu mo du yang skye bo'i tshogs blams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugasar dung/ blta bas mi ngomasangashing/ bka' blo bde laras pa dang/ 'jam pa dang/ snyan
ba dang/ dga' bar smrazhing/ bzhin 'dzum padang/ shin tu 'thun par 'dzinapa dang khriganyeramadar dang/ ma rtsub pa dang/ mi b.rangabar gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen po
den/ rgyal bu gzhonanu rnams dang/ blon po 'a bu gzhonanu rnams dang/ tshong dbon gyi bu gzhonan rnams dang/ khyim ngadag gi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang/ de la shin tu chags shing la da
'drang bar gyur te/ bltangs chog ma shes so// smad 'tshong ma 'bu mo ba gser mchog 'od dapa' de skyed mos tshal la ma/ bang chu bam/ rdzing bu nam/ khyimamam/ 'a ma ngo ma bam/ grongabar ram

gang dang gang du 'gro bde dang de dag tu/ spyasar dang/ bud mad dang 3 khyobu dang/ ngu mo mang re rnams kyang shin tu ltad mor gyur nas/ kun 'dus te de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro'o// de nas smad
'tshong ma' du me gsar mchog 'od dang la de tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bas nor gyis glas te/ skyed mos tshul gyi sar byang nas/ rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang/ nor bu dang/ mu
tigadang/ bi zurla dang/ gsar gyis legs par brgyanapa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgrung zhing/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang spos dang/ phya mdang/ ma tog 'phreng
ba'i mdzes par byas r/ matogatsamapa ka'i 'phrangangs skar khung byas pa'i nang du stan bzang po bshams pa 'a 'duganas/ 'di ltar rtsa zhing dga' ba'i bsam pa sa shing rta nga'i mdun du ni/
sil snyanadang/ phag rjod pa dang/ glu dbyangs le napadrag gis drangs/ shing dang phyabazhin du nyi ngar spyad pa dang/ yongs su spyadang thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/ skya bo'i tshogs
chenang ltad mo blta ba'ingasamapa can dgakyang/ phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur rung/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ngo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nang du yang dag 'jog las langs
te: sems can thamasacudal snying rje chenapo skyas nas/ 'di snyamadu sams te/ su zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su
bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'du'abar 'gyur ba'i sems canagang thag pa chen po 'di la yongs su smin par bya snyam pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurangs/ smad 'tshongama'i bu mo gsar
mchog bodadapal tshong dpon[Â©]du 'jigs med lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro b.ramathong ngo// mthong nas kyang gdul ba'i phyiranA'i dbang po dang/ stobs dang
brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par bltas na/ de sngon gyidagaba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing/ chos kun shes parubyaba'anus pa dang/ mthudang/ skal ba yod par rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe
rgyu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrulamangon par 'du bya ba mngonapar 'du byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus bstanam thug
tu/ nyimadang zlaba'i 'od kyang zil du gapar byed na/ soms can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ca degos prade lta durarang gi lus rnam par sprul nas/ gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad gcig
tshamagyi khor yugasnang ba/ snang bar byedapa'i gosade lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tubastanato// nga ga lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnamaparaMbargyan par yang bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas/lus la gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas smad 'tshom bu mo gsemchog 'od dapal 'ong ba'i lam re'i mdun logs su bsdad do//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pasadarab sdad ma gragatu/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de shing rta yang mog mog por gyur/ smad 'tshong sa'abumo gsaramchog 'od dpa 'gyi lus thamasacad kyang mog mog
por gyu// 'di lta ste dang ngan/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi drung du snag tsha'i yug bzhagan/ lham mar mi 'dug lhan ner mi 'dug/ lhung der mi 'dug go/ dbazhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyis rig pa ni/ bu mo de'i lus kyang lham mer mi 'dug/ lhan nar ma 'dug/ lhangangar mi 'dug go/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsaramchog bodadapal gyis/ 'khramadapal
gzhon nur gyurapa lha'i bu gzhon nur ltar 'dug la/ lus la rgyunagyis brgyan cing/ gsal ba'i go 'gas par gyon la/ gos de las kyang 'od 'byungabar mthengasta/ mthong ma thag tu dbag
gi'usalabanas pa'i 'du shes dang/ dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing/ gros de la nang mngonapara'adod pa dang/ bzungaba'i 'dus skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong
dpon gyi bu 'das chog gis/ bdag shing rta 'di las babs la/ 'di dang lhan cig tudaga' ba dpa/ rtse ba dang/ dga' dagur spyad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// bu
mo des de lta bu'i samasabaskyadam thagatu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byinagyi rlabs kyis// rgyal nga tshanaro rnam shes kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugasasu
po'i mngon par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces snasaso// bumo khyed skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma skyedacig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin
pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa// 'di su zhig yananA/ 'di'i mingatsa/ rnam thos kyidus smras pa/ 'di na byang chub samasadapa' ste/ 'dzamadapala gzhon nur gyurang zhes bya'o// bu mos
sang// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bde ci zhig yin/ de ru lha 'am/ 'on te klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za ngom/ lham yinanam/ nam mkha' ldang ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am lto 'phye
chon po 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po tshanapo 'am/ byang chub nams dang 'a zhes bya bad ci zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ bu mobang chub
soms dang bzhes bya ba den/ lha dang ma yan/ klu yang ma yin/ gnod sbyin yang ma yin/ dri za yangs yin/lham yan yang ma yani/ nam mkha' lding yang ma yin/ mi 'am ci yang ma yin/
lto 'phye chen po yang ma yan/ brgya byin yang ma yin/ tshangs pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba yang ma yin/ rgyal re chen po yang ma yin te/ bu mo da na sems can thams rud kyi bsam pa kun
yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'di nibaslangs pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/ yongasasum gtong ba ci yang med pas/ dge phyir byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ de nas bu mo de 'di snyamo du sems te/ de skad grags pa lasan 'das bdag la gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ro snyamanas/ de nas smad 'tshongama'i bu mo gsar mchog 'od
dpa la shing rtade las babs nas/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jamadang la gang khyod kyi sku lagasolaba'i na bzung 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/de'i tshatshigasasu
bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gal te khyod ni byang chub la yang zhugs gyur na// 'dzamadabyang san bza' 'dini bdag la stsaladu gsol// ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes te/ dper na
chab dang bral ba'i bskamasapa'i klung dang mtshungs// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyed ni byang chub zhugs gyur na// kho bos de rang gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya// gang dag g.yo ba
mad par byang chub sams la gnas// de dag 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rtenamachod 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces bgyi ba yi tshig gi don gang zhig lags// de ni gang las blob/
cing su zhig stsol bar bgyid// tshogs rnams gang dag lan nges par bsten bgyisan// mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur// 'jam dang la gyis smras// sring mo
brjod pa med pa dang/ yi ga med pa dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched dag las rnam par grolang dang// stong pa dang/ mtshan ma dag dang bral ba dang/ nyon mongs
pa med pa dang/ zhu ba dang/ rab tu zhi bdang/ nye bar zhi ban byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ yang 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bum da la 'di skad ces smras so// sring
mo khyed byang chub tu sems skyid cig dang/ ngas khyod la gros 'di sbyin no// bumos smras pa/ 'jamadapal byang chub ces bgyi bde gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo khyod nyid byang
chub yin no// bu mos smras pa// 'jamadapal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de ngadag gis ma 'tshalan/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smyos pa/ sring mo de bzhin gshegs
padagra bcomar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhesabya ba bzhugs pa// 'di skad du 'di ltar lus manyam nga nyid kyis byung bamanyam pa nyid do/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus

mnyam pa nyid do las chos ston te/ srang mda' phyirangs khyod la 'di skad du khyod med byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo 'di ji snyam dus mas/ khyod kyi lus 'di'i phung po dang/ khamasadang/ skya mchod mngon par grung

pa yodadam/de nas bu mo des bstan pa 'di blosanas/de sngon gyi degaba'i rtsa ba'irgyu 'khrunapas/ chos la snang bskyasar 'gyur te/ des snang ba thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la 'deskad ces smras so// 'jam
dang la de ni da lta lags te/ bdag gi lus 'di laphung po dang/ khamasadang/ skye mched dag mngonang 'grub pa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa// sring mo 'di snyam du se mas// gzugs lasags/
pa bam/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jamadapalade ni mamachis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang ma sems shing/ rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo

de'i phyir gzugasamanyam pa nyid kyis byang chub manyamang nyid do// byang chub manyamapa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyirangs khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
so sring mo 'di je snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam nga rashesapa las mas ra 'am rnamapar shesapa yodadam/ bu mos pasapa/ 'jam dpal
ni ma mchis so// 'jam dang la rgyas sdus pa/ sring mi byang chub kyang mi samasangashing/ rnam par shes pa mdad/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyamapa nyid kyis byang chub manyamapa nyid do//
byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyisarnam par shesar mnyamapa nyided/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub b zhusaa so// sring mogazhan yang gzugasanang ngam/ phyi rol lam/
gnyis ka med par ram/ gzugs 'di ston pa'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/ lengargan nam/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yulan gnas nga ma/ phyogs na
@#/ gnas pa zhes bstanupar nus sam/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpald nim legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/phyi'il lam/ gnyis
ku mdara'am/byang chub dasngonapo 'as/ ser bo 'am dmarapa'am de dkar po 'am/ labargan nam/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog gam/ mu'anaganas pa'amA/ phyogasan gnas pa
zhag bstan pa mnusato/ sring mo da' phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub ma nyam pa dade/ byang chub manyam panyid kyis gzugs mnyes pa dad/ sringamodi'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du
khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ srimadabazhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang nang ngam/phyi re' lam/ gnyisakamed par ram rnam par
shes pa 'di sngon po 'am/ sarabo 'am/ dmar bo 'am/ dkar po 'am/ la brgananam/ shul dang/ dngul gyi kha dog gan/ shu la na gnas pa 'am phyogs na gnas pa zhes nga snyan ngar nus
wi sam bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal de nim lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka mad par ma/ byang chub de sngon ngo 'am/
bar po 'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po'am/ la brgan nam/ shal dang/ dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yulan gnas nga 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring

ma pa'i phyir rnam nga la shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub ma nyam pa nyid de// byang nub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod
nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang dung bo ldan sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod ngo ma ya ni// phyin ci log las skyes shing/ yodapa ma yinang// phyin pa'ig gis tha snyad btags pa'o//

sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pas// srid me de'i phyir sgyum mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyamapa nyid kyis

sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/ sgyu mas mang da kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid de/ byang chub mnyamang nyid kyis sgyum mnyam pa nyidad/ srung mda'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bozhas

smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung nge ldani rmi lam lta bu sti shan tu mngon ra ra ma grub pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas/shin tu mngon pa 'amagrul sta/ sring mo de'i phyir lam

mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// thung ro ma nyam nga nyid kyis rma lam mnyam pa nyidad// rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis byang nubamanyam pa nyid do// byang chub manyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa

nyid de/sring mo da'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mogazhan yang phung po ldani smigargyu lta bu sta/ 'khrul pa'i las kyisabaskyed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang/
sma rgyu'i rang bzhinate/ las kyi rnamar rasminapamed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir smig rgyumanyam pa nyid kyis phung pomanyam pa nyidade// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu/

mnyam pa nyid do// smig rgyu mnyam panyid kyis byang chub mnyamar nyid do// byang chub manyamapa nyid kyis smig rgyu maMnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo da' phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chung ngo zhes
smras so// sring mo gzhan yod phung po ldani gzugasabarnyanalta bu hU~M/ 'pho ba mdapa'o// sring mo byang chud kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhinate/'do ba redang 'o// sring mo de'i phyiragazugs b.rAn
mnyam pa nyid kyis phung pos dmar 'dud/ phung pomanyam pa nyid kyis gzugs bamAnamanyam pa nyid do// gzugs brnyanamanyamapa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyamapa nyid kyis gzugs

brnyanamanyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyirangs khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung de ldan ming tsam sti/ madred yang go nga ma da nga 'o// sring mo byang chub kyang ming

pa tsam ste/ mang du yang g.yo ba med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung pomanyam pa nyid de// dung demanyam pa nyid kyis gshe ba med pa mnyamapa nyid do// g.ye ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub

mnyamab nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yobashad pa mnyam pa nyidad/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//sring mogazhan pa nga dngapo rnams la byed pa nga med de/mangs

nga 'a ren ni byang chub// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid mdad/ngo bo nyid med pa'i donan byang chub ngo// dung po rnams la byung ba med da/ ma byung ba'i donan byang chung ba// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/ mi rtag pa'i

donan byang chub b// phung po rnams la bdag nyid mad da/ sdugabasngal ba'i donani byang chub bo// rung po rnams la sdug pa med de/ mi sdug pa'i don nubyang chung ngo// phung po rnams la bdag mad de/ bdag med pa'i/

donan byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang dpung po rnams la mngon par grub pa mang de/ mngonang ram grung nga 'i denan byang chub ngo// phung po rnamasanadaban pa ste/ dnganapa'i don ni byang chub ngo// phung po rnams la

gzung ba med de// gzung ba med 'i den ni byang chub bo// dung po rnams la gzhi med de/ gzhi med pa'i don na byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med da/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mad pa'i

don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba lami gnas pa sta/ da ltar byung ba lam gnas nga 'i don ni byang chub yi// sring mo gzhan yang phungapo rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyi grasnyad yin pas/

byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do// phung po rnams ni grwa snyad mad pa'irong zhin canata/ byang chub kyang tha snyad madrang 'o// phung po lnga'i rangang zhen gang yin pa ngani da bzhin gshags pas thugs

su chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhinati/ nganibyang chub ces bya'o// sring mod ltar na phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ sring mo
@#// phung po lnga'i rang bzhinagang yin pa dang/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ sring mda'i phyir ngas khyed la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang
chub bo zhes smras so// sring mogazhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma gtogs par yang rtogs pa yang mad la/ byang chub la gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas/

de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji ltar sems can

thams cad byang chub tugatogs dra ltar/ dgatogs pa med nga rab stan pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la de skad du khyod nyid byang chung ba zhes snam so// sring mogazhan yang khyod kyis lus
'dal/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ khams bzhi po de dgamangonang ra grub pa de la/ sring mos 'i khams ni bdagam yin/ sems can ma yin/
pa srog ma yan/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yanano// byang chub kyang dgam yin/ semasacan yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// dbazhin du chu'i khams
dang ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems canam yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zagam yin no// byang chub kyang ng dag ma yin/ sems canam yin
gam yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shinatunamamakha' dang mtshusapa'i phyiras de khams dang byang chub manyam mo// shin tu med pa'i phyur chu'i khams dang byang chub mnyamamo// shin tu
mgayoba'i phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu bstan du med pa'i phyi rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// sringamo sa'i khams gang yanang 'i khams de ni/ dngazhinagashegs pas
mkhyen te/ mngonapar rdzogs par thugasasu chud do// sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i rang mas de na/ dbazhinagazhags nga sa mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogasarar thugs su chud do// sring mo ma'i khams
gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshagasungs mkhyenate/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// srang na rlung gi khams gang sa ne pa'i khams de ni/ da nga zhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon

par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo sa'i khams rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo da bzhin du chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams rtogs pa na byang chub sta/ sring mo de'i phyir

ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub de zhes smras so// srang mosa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dgang ra mi shes so// chu'i khamasakyis mi'i khams yang dag par ma shes so// ma'i khams kyis

rlung gi khams yang dag par mngegs so// sring mo de ltaran khams kyi ming yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub be zhes smras
so// sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di lamug mngonapar grub pa dang/ dbazhinadu rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lcad ng/ lus dang/ ing mngon par grung padal/ sring

mo mag ni stong pa ste/ mig stong pa nyid kyirang bzhinan byang chub bo// nu bani stong pa ste[u0f7c]rnab stongang nyid kyi rang bzhin na byang chub bo// sman stor sta/sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo lce

nu stong pa ste/ lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chung ba// dus ni stong pa sdu/ lus stong nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni stong ste/ yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhi ni byang nub sring
de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan dang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa don gzugs su 'dogs par mi byad gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyidan

byang chub bo// rnab dang sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed// chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub sku/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la khrod skad du

khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo mige gzugs mi lan te/ byang chub kyang gazugs mi len te// rnabani sgra ma lenate/ byang chub kyang sgra mi len to// snan dra ma lenate/byang chub kyang dra mi len to

lcanir ma yin te/ byang chub kyang ro ma 'inato// lus ni rigabyami len te/ byang chub kyang rigabyami lenate// yi da ni chosami lenate/ byang chub kyang chos mi len to// sring mo da ci'i phyir zhon/ mig

gzugs dang bral ba'i byang chub bo// yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de ltaranamig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa den/ gzugs kyi khams dang mtshams
sbyorang mad de/ mig grirnam da ra shes pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su bralabani byang chub bo// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ rna
ba'i rnam par shesapa'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams su bral bani byang chub bo/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin/de ni/ dra'i khams dang ma tshunas sbyor ba med de/ sna'i rnam pa rashes pa'i
khams dang/ dri'i khams su bral ngani byang chub bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de na re'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba ma de/ lcab rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ ro'i khams
su bral ban byang chub bo// lus kyi rnam par shas ra 'a khams gang yin pa dan/ gabya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes nga 'a khams dang/ reg pa'i khams su
bral ba ni byang chub bo// yi da kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni (chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'i khams dang/ chos kyi khams su bral ba

ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su
dganyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang/ yid kyi khams kyabar dung niganyis su med dganyis su dbyar mod do// byang chub dang chos kyi khams dren gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar med do/
byang chub dang/ yad kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar med do/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyed la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ sring mo gzhan
yadamag mi rtogs pa ni byang chub// de nga zhenadu rnab drang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ma rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/rang bzhin stong padan byang chub bo/
dbazhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus ng (yid kyirang bzhanan stong pa sto/ rang bzhin stongamAde na byang chub bo/ sring mo mig gi rang bzhinanam chags ma sdang ma rmongs pa ste/'dod chags

dang zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub be// rnab dang/ sna dang/ lcang lus dang/ bad kyi rang bzhanani ma chags mi sdangam rmongs pa ste/'dodachags dang/ dusdang dang/ gti mug dang bral ba
ni byang chub bo// sring mo migen bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongasasu 'dzinar med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi medang/ yongs su 'dzanang med pa'o// de bzhin du
bdang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yod kyang bdag po med nga/ bdag gi med pa// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa// bdag gi med pa// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o//

srangan mag ni skyes pa'i tshesadang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud mad kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// srang mo byang chub kyang skyesar 'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang
ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang m A nano// sring mo de bzhin du rlung dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan ng yang ya na

bud mad kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan r yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang gyas pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs nga ra ldan ng yang ma yin no//
sring mod bzhin du mig na skyes pa yang yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mabya chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo yid kyi ngor du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud

sad kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ dud mod kyang ma yin no// srung mod ltar mig gdabazhin nyid ni de bzhin gshagasaras thugs su chudade/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang/

chub bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bdu yang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sre mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//
sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi 'us 'di ni bdag ma yin/ sems canam yin/srogam yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ grang zagam yin/ byed las skyes pa ma yin/shed bu ma yin
byed pa pom yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ snomadra po ma yani/ zab po ma yin/reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par shesad po ma yin no//
sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srogam yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yAn/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma yAn/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba
ma yin/ gajugs ma yin/ sgrom yin/ dri ma yin/ rom yani/ reg bya rnam par rig pa ma yin te/sring mo ra lta bas na chos thams cad ma nyam pa nyidan byang chub ces bya'o/sring mo gang//
'ang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtog pa med pa ste/ rtswa dang/ shangadang/ shing ljonang dang/ rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing/ thadad du dbyer med do/ sring
mo gang yang nang gi sa' kha sadang/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gnyis su med cing/ gnyis su dbyer madracing/gnyis su dbyar mod// 'di ltar mtshan da med par man nyid gcig par/

dbazhin gshags pasangashas bab dang/ dengashas kyis mngonapal rdzogs par thugs su chud de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo la gzhan yang
sems dang/ yad dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sa masang dang/ rnam par shes pa'i sems dang/ yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni// skral gnas pa ma yin/
spu la gnas pa ma yani/ shamadog la gnas pa ma yin/ grags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa ma yin/ rus pa la gnas pa ma yin chub la gnas pa
ma yin/ rkang laganas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyil la gnas pa ma yin/ gnyis ka tshad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna
la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pas yin/lus la gnas pas yin/ padilaganas pa ma yinate/ gnas pa ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyun chadang ma yin/ su la na gnas pa ma yin
phyogasan gsapa ma yin/ gzugasumed pa// bstan du med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gzudang mdapa/ 'dre bamed pa// gzhi med pa// dag po/ gtsangang/ 'od gsal ba ste//
sems dang dekyi rnam par rig pade ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med//rnam byang ba med pa ste/ donirang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing bodagasalal/ lus mdor 'i phyir/ kun nas
nyon mongs pa med cing/ rnamapar dag pamadado// sringamodilta na phung podang/ khams dang/ skyo mchod kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung bo dang/ khams dang//
'a// skye mched rnams so// sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched gang dag mngon 'a grub pa de dgan byang chub// byang chub gzhan ma yin no//
si ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub nipung ro dang/ khams dang/ skyemachad rnams las gzhan ma yin te/ de bdag nyid byang chub yinaras/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub yanang gi
phyir// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes pas so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur nga sa bstanang 'daba'adapan/namamakha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga
'bum gyis kun mdar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gang dag smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog dadapal gyis phyibazhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang/ bud mdadang/ khye'u

dang bu mo rnanya sa las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusams bskyedado// lhadang madrug ni chos rnams latshos kyi mig rdulamed cing dri ma dang bralang rnam par dag
go smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsaramchog 'od dang la yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/dgabab dang pa da ngad ba skyes te/ yan lag las phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dag 'dun la skyabs su song nas/ tshangs par spyad pa dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dgapar bangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na
med pa yang dag ra ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di skad rtsas sus so// khajam dpal bdag kyang/ khyod kyi rjes su bstan pa dang/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang/

stang rjesasas rgyas kyi gdung ma gcod pa dang/ chos klog dung migacodapa dang/ dag 'dun gyi gdung mgacodar 'i sladadu/ khyod kyis bstan pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed par bgyi'o/ de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i med du/ sums can blamasaM cad lachos bstan par yang bgyi'o// zhes ngar bgyis pa'i las kyi sgribapa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ nongs
pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o// gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar martogs nas/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang/ phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis
padang/ rang gi lus la mngon par zhan pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sams can rnams kyis no/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhinamartogasaso// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang
gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems cand dag kyang/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub semasadapa' rnamasani ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing/
banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnamasani/ji ltar mchis pa ma lags pa la/ kun brtagasapa las 'byung bar da ltar
@#/ kun brtags dra rengs su rtogs na 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i sladadu'o// 'jam dar la ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltaran/
nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchisanga'ang byung ba ma mchis pas sprinagyi tshigs dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams na skad cig la 'jig cad ' ga ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa
rnams nang shin tu mngonapar grub pa ma mchis pa starlung dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams na yul thams cad las yang dagang rab das te/ nam mkha'i ri modang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang du
a mi gnas pas chu'ir me dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma 'gas pa yang lo brgyad pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams na ma
mchesar la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las 'byung ba ste// sprinam dang 'dra'o/ nyonamasang rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag nga ba ma 'grogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin
ngas lhag par chags pa dang 'brelaba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams na bdag gir 'dzin pas/ dngos por yongs su 'dzanapa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni lag pas bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o//
nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnamasani khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bslad pa ste/ so sor mi rtog
pa'o/ nyon mongs pa rnams nasams dang rjes su 'thun par baspyad pa ste/ nges par mi sems pa'o// nyen mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhanapa las byung ste/ yid
rgyas par mi bgyi ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnamasAni khams rnams la ril ngor 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o
nyon mongs pa rnamasan ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyudang dag mi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpald lta lags/
mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ byang chub kyi pur bu'agazhi lags so// decu'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o klon mongs pa rnamasani byang

chub kyis bonate/ nyon mongs partogasar nyid byung chub lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang rlu brdo rje'i ga gzhi lag so// de ci'i slad duzhen/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ byang

chub n nyon mongs pa rnams kyisam phyed pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnamasamathong ni byang nub ste/ byang chub n yulathams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// 'jamadapal dziltar byang chub rnam par
gnas pa mamachis pad ltaranyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa mchachis pa ste/ skyes nas 'dzugatsanga'adrubs ma gnas pa go 'jam dpalanyon mes pa rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so//
de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'jam dpal sems 'di ni/ chags pa 'am/ snang ba bam/ rmongs pa zhes// sems kyi rang bzhin bstanapar mi nus te/ 'jamadapa la ji ltar
sems bstan par mi nus pa dengazhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang/ yul na gnas pa 'am )phyogs na gnas bzhes/ nyon mongs pa'irang bzhinabastanapar mi nus pa'i slad du 'jam dpal
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da tshanangos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sams cananams longs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar
gi ralo zhe sdang la spyodang rnams la ma lags/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams lam lags tre/ namanyam pa la spyod pa'i sums can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam
dang lad ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang dri lta ba bzhinadu/ zhe sdang la
sbyod pa thams cad kyi zhi snang la blta bar bgyig/ 'dzamadapalan ltar bdag ga gtamugaji lta ba de bzhin du/ gti mugalaspyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jamadapalade ltar
bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o 'jam dang la 'di lta ste dang lan/ mni rtswa
dang shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi ma yang nyon mes pa'i rtswa dang/ shing thams cad kyis 'jigs ra ma mchis so//
'jam dpal 'di lta ste dpar na/ nyi ma'idakyil 'khor ni/ mun ng mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal da bzhin du dpags pa'i shes rab kyang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dang la'adi lta sta dang ra na/ rlung dmar ni nga ljon padang/ ri thams cad la mi chags so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shas rab la spyod pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' yang/ nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la mi chagos so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dang ran)nam mkha'i khams ni srog pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyisatshig par mi 'gyur ro//
'dzamadabalar bzhin du 'phags pa shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyon mongs pa'i srog pa'i bskul pa thams cad kyisatshigapa mi 'gyur ro/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/
nam mkha'ani rdul dang/ nabunadang smin thams cad dang lhan cig miganas so// 'jam dang la de bzhin du khong gas pa'i shes bal spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' long/ nyon mongs bathams cad dang
lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'ani sa dang lhan cig miganas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shesarab l spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang/ nyon/
ba @#/ mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal ni lta sta/ bar na khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnasaso// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags/
'ba' shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang/ tonamongs pa ny+dzams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri khor yuganirlung thams cad kyis bskyod rang mi
nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyodamaraminus so// 'jamadangal 'di lta ste dparan/ dud
'gro'i skye gnas su song ba/ byadang nga zhes bgyi bani/'omadang chang bsres pa las/ 'om nyid na 'tshal gyi/ chub nam lags so// 'jamadapal da bzhind 'phags pa'i shesarang la spyod pa'i byang
chub sems dang bu yang/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang/ nyon mongs pa dang 'dusapadrag las shas rang nyid ni len gyi/ nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/byang gi sgra mi
kyi snyanagyi gling na/nye dur 'bral ba'i bud med rnamasal/ shing gi yal ga 'dud par ma bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dbang de yongasasu ma smin nga 'i sams can rnams la/ byang chub sems dang 'i
spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang yang shes 'dudapar mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal bdag de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigasam 'am/ skrag pa ci yang mamachis so/ datso'i slad du
ma/ zhen 'dzum dpa la bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dbang rnams ni/ 'jigamakha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa lta/ bajam/
dang la 'di lta ste dpa'an/ gang dgras 'jigs pa danadang 'a bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jamadapal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o/
'jam dpal 'di lta ste dparan/ gang dgra bcom pa de ni dpa' bo nas ma bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du ganganyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de yang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
mi bgyago/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dparan/ nor bu rin po chachuldang zhes bgyi bachab kyi nang du snyal na gshar bar yang ma 'gyur zhing/ chab kyi dri mas kyang ma gos la/ chab kyi rnyog ma thams cad
kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do// 'jam dang 'a de bzhin du 'phagasar shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang/ nyon mongs pas gshar bar yang mi 'gyur zhing
nyon mongs pa'i dri masakyang mi gos la/ nyon mdasara'i rnyog ma thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// denas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsar mchog 'od dang la gyis bstan pa 'di bshad
nas/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur nga la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongasam mamachisar 'gas/'jamadapalagyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub sems sku
dba'agang gis nyon mongs pa skyo ba'am/ 'gag par mathon/ byang chub sems dpa' de'onamongs pa thams cad med bzhes mkhya'o// sri'o 'di lta ste dper na/ cu/

ma gyi sgron ma 'amun pa mun nag snangan/ de'abru mar gyisgron ma zhes mi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a gangagis nyon mongs pa skyob 'am/ 'gag pa mthongan/ byang chub sems dba'i/
des nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya// sum stonamongs bamed pa zhes bya ba na/ sugangakun nas 'chongs pa yapasimathong/ rnam par byang ba yang ma mthong// mthong ba dang/ migashongab dang/
sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par ngag pa dang bral ba nyon mongs ba med pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du ser sa dang/ yid dang/ rnam par rig nga 'jugan/ tha namya nganabs 'das bar sems bar
yang rung// de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'a nas gnam/ sems la 'jugang che dpa' po'i te/ gang gis dge ba bam/ mi dge nga'idamigs pa

rgyu: sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad namangon par 'du byed pa'o// gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// gang 'khor ba de 'du byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sringamode dag nyon mos
pa yin no// srimartenamos nga zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/ tshig dgazugasasusbyor ba'on longasang 'o// nga bzhinadunab dang/ sgra dang/ sbya dang/ dridang/ lce dang/ ro dang/ lus dang/
reg bya dang/ yid dang chos su sbyor bamartonamongs pa'o// tshul khrims la sbyor ba nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyonamos nga'o// shes rab dang/ rnam pa grol ba dang/

rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor bzhi'onamos pa'o// rab tu dben bal sbyorab l en sa pa ni nyon mongs pa 'o// srang mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bya
dgas go/ de ni spros pamadab zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de'i rtsol bamed ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de'i 'byungar med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ sring mo grangs dang/

grangs med pa dang bral ba ni nyin mosapamedab nyid de// sring mo gzhan ya nga byang chub semasangaba'agang bdag la yang nyon mongs ra me dal/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las kyang rab du thar bar bya ba la
yang shin tu brtson bden/ nyon mongs pamed pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag
phu'a'a'o// bu mos sas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags/ 'jam dang 'a gyis sa ba/ stong pa nyidalasosor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug
cing/ lta ba la sbyodapa'isams can rnams la snying rje ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa la soso'artogs pa rjes su 'jug cing/ mtshanam 'a spyod ba'isin sa can rnams la snying rjeb dang/ g+hon
tsha gya@#// pamed pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing/ snon pa la sdod pa'i sems can rnams la sAng rjeb dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa so sor rtogs pa'i/
kyi rjes su 'jug cing/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang/ bye bamad tsang 'chi'ajomadaba' gogor rtogs pa'irjes su 'jugatsang/ rga ba dang/ shibar/
'du shes pa'isam can rnams la snying rje ba dang/ skye bzhedapa la so sor rtogs nga 'i rjes su 'jug cing/ skyab dang/ 'jig par 'du shes ba'asams can rnams lasAng rje ba dang/ na
thos su ngeg pa lasosor rtogs pa'i rdzig su 'jug cing/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang/ rangs ngas rgyas su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jugatsang/ rang ngas
rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldogapa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'iskyog med pa la 'jug pa so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing/ sems can thams cad la yang snying rje bste/ sring mo 'di'i byang
chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul go/ singamo 'di ltaste dper na/ rgya mtsho'in po'ajug ba na su'i ni boche bo dgathogs te ldog par 'dakab ko/ sumo de bzhin du stong
pa nyidal so sor rtogs par naslo'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldogapanadaka' ko/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smonang med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ skye ba me dar dang/
tham/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi skyon med de la yang so sor rtogs pa ran sla'i/thabasalan khas pa dang bral bsaljogabazhudaka' 'o// sringa'adi lta
sta dbaran/ g.yul ngo chon bor 'jug nasla'i/ ma smas pam nyams par rgyal bar nadaka' 'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jugapa nasA'i/ thabs lamakhas pa dang
bral bas ldeg bar na dkaba'o// bumes sas pa/ 'jam dpal thabs zhesabargya brdzalta bu lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras ngo/ sring mo thabs zhes byakhani/ gang phyogs gnyisam sbyong bste/

'diltarab kho ba'i phyogs dang1 mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so/2/ sring mo thabs zhes bya ba gang sgo gnyis ston pa'abyed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang 1/ stong pa nyidi kyi
sgo dang/ lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang/ mtshan mamed pa'i sgo dang/ mtshanam lasarnam par thar pa'isgo dang/ ston mchod pa'i sgo dang/ bsam bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang/ mngon par 'du byed

pa zhe dad 'i sgo dang/ dge ba mngon du bya ba'i sgo dang/ skye bane da pa'i sgo dang/ skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang/ 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyomached kyi sgo dang/ skye ba med tsang/

'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang/ skyo ba dang/'byung ba'i sgo dang/ bden nga 'i sgo dang/ soms can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgodang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi sgo dang/ chos thams cad so sor bsrungaba'isgo dang
nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang/ byang chub sems dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang/ rang byang chub kyi sgo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mabarjodapa'i sgo ste/ srimo byang chub sems
dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang/ sgo thams cad la yang chags pamed pa de na bsamakhas pa zhes byago/ de bzhin du 'dodags kyi sgo dang/ 'dodachags dang bral ba'i sgo dang/ zhe sdang gi sgo/

dang zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang/ gti mug gasgo dang/ gtimug dang bral ba'i sgo dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang/ 'gro bathanag cad kyi sgo dang/ 'gro bamed pa'i sgo ste/

sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thubs lamakhas pa'o// byis ba so so'i skya bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang/ slob pa'i dang/ ma slobar dang/nyan thos dang/ rasangs rgyas dang/ byang chub semA
dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis ka shes pa gang yin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dang 'i thabasalamakhas pa zhes bya'o///bam po gnyis pa statha ma'o
yang de'itsho/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ngos kyi sman ljong zhigin/ zhabs 'bring byed nga 'i dge slong tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dngagacig tu ring du 'chags pas/ 'chag cing bzhugs
go der bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jamadapala gzhon nur gyur ba la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yang dgaphuladang/ thabs la mkhas pa ji skad bstan
wapa de'adi bzhin te/ legasaso legasaso zhes bya ba na ba dang/ legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dadabyangs kyis go bgyurang/ legs so
zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis/ stong gsumagyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dirnam ba drugatugayos par gyur nas/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drakhra dang/ lham yin dang/ ma
mkha'awang dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mam yin pa rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bamang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bsu'ags/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste da ni nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasalamago bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khodanas/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod
sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi bam ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ brgya bzhi dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis//
bcom ldan 'das la 'dik+kadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'degs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gangags stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyas kyis go ba mdzad ba de/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis su lasal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyurar 'go/ lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur/
bya ba de dal gnamachis/ bcomaldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal ba/ lha'i bu dga' jam dbala gzhon nur gyur ba ni/ rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/
ka smad 'tshong ma'abumo gseramagado dbal zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gas/ lha'i bu dag gangadagachos15bar 'dod pa dag kyang der dengazhig/ de nas lha dang/
dang gnosbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ namamakha'aldang dang/ mi 'am cad ng/ lta'aphya chen po dang/ mi dang/ mis yin pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'dragi rten skyong la
de dgathams cod lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ lus rags bar sprul nas/ me tog gis rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char des rgyal po
khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ me tog gis char bar bkram par gyur to// denasalha rnams kyis kyang ma rnams mthong zhing/ mi rnamasakyis kyang lha rnams mthong ste/ phan tshunas bar ma byed do// deltar
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen bo nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag me tog dag gsakyang bskul/ lha'i lus ragasar dedag gis kyang bskun s/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba
der dong ngo// rgyalapo ma skyes dgra yang budamed kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dpung gatshogs yan lag bzhi ba dang lhan cig rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang/ rgyal po'amathuchen pos/ 'jam dpal/
mas/ gzhon nur gyur ba ga la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang/ rgyal bo ma skyes dgra dang/ blon po dang/ blon po'i bu rnams dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag bu rnams kyis/ sud 'tshong
ma'i bu mo gosaramchog 'od dpal de/ 'dod chagasas nyon mongs par kun nas ldangab dang bral te/ dbang po dang spyod lan rob tuzhi zhing/ dbang po mi g.yengal/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/
dal gyis legs bar brgyan pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'batsanicad su yang 'dodaba'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba// skye bo'atshigs chen po
de 'dus par rab gnas/ snyada'atshongama'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dbalal 'a dasogaces smras so// bu mo skye bo' tshogs thams cad kyis khyod mthongayang/ phyir zhingachagasabakodan/ khyod kyis
nyon mongs ba de dag gang du bzhag/ bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi rten chos ba rnams ni/ yengashes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang/ chos kyi de byings la gnas pa/
ste/ de dag kyang chab skyod pa dang/ ma bkag pa dang/ ma bskyab deltar bdag gis rtogs so// nyon mongs pa'irang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa// bumo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bumos smras pa// 'jam dpal rtog ba ma mchis shing/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis b.rang bzhin nyon mongs pa'i nga bzhi lags so//
tshu la bzhin ma 'gas bam skyes pa'i ngabazhi zhimos pa'i rang bzhin lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni glo bur te/ stong panyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig gnas/
so mtshan ma med pa dang/ 'onapamed parishes pa dang lhan cig gnas so// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal kha dang lhan cig gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dpon/ dug drag po'i sprul/
gdug pas bltas pa tsam gyis/ skya bo'agum par 'gyur ba las/ de'agazhi gag dug thams cad 'jil ba dang/ dug thams cad rab tuzhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnodasal zhes bgyi ba 'tshal tems/

nag de nas sman de bstanam thog tu sprul gdug pa'i dugadem mchisapar bgyis nas/ de la khye'udang bumo rnams rtse pas rtsazhing/ khye'u dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/
pangang lenatsing glo la se ral 'brong du btags te/ rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za bar mi bgyid/ sdug sngal du mi bgyid do// 'dzom da la de bzhin du bdag kyang sngonachos 'dul
bas thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags la yid 'bagyid pa'i log las nye bar gnas pa'i mongs pas yogo/ su bsregs ban/ 'dodachagasarang gi lus lags shing/ rang gi
gzugs lamangonapazhinate/ gozugasadabu blta bu so sor rtog par mi bgyid/ lus ma'itshos rtadi dum 'tshal/ dga' ba'irtsedamo rmi lam lta bu r ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i byang ba sbrang
rtsi' thogs pa lta bu r ma 'tshol/ srog gi dbang bo rjel ba'i thags pa lta bu m 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par ma tshal/ 'dubyed thams cad shinatu/
sngagabasngal b.ramo tshal cing/ chos thams cad bdagam mchis pAr go sor rtog par ma bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pamun nag gso ba de sa shingo/ gzhal gdanu'ada' bgyid/ bdag kya mI/
shing gzhan langag cing bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi/ bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka'amanyid thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shang/ mos nasakyanas par grol te/
de'i slad du bdagadaltar dang/ snyanadachags pa'amog gsasu la yang blta bar mi bgyid go/ de ci'i slad duzhen/ 'jam dpal snang ba mun pa drang snyan mi gnas so// bajam dpal de bzhin du
'dod chags dang phral ba su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// denau'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pal/ sadu 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog dadapal gyis 'di skad ces/
lcagaso/ kyem 'jam dpalalha'i 'khor dang/ mi'i 'khor chenubo 'di'i dus kyis/ gang gis lha dang chu 'dangug gis nyon mongs pa'irangabazhi'i dedag rtogs nas// sems can rnams la

snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyurab delta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchid bgyi bar khyod spobs dmadzod cig/ 'jam dang 'a rgyas sar// sring mo nyon mongs
b.rang bzhin 'gos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo nyon mongs nga 'irang bzhin/ byang chub yanang gi phyir// sring mo 'di lta snyadaper na/ ma ma sbyarab ni srog pa'i/
gi bdaganyidam yino// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs sumabartags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyidam yago/ sringamo 'di lta ste dper na/ ma smranasrogaba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo de/
bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su brtagasan/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'dilta ste dban/ ma na rgyu yod na 'bar ro// srayod bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang
ba'i rgya modan/ khams gsum du 'bar ro// srim 'dit+ta ste dper na/ man rgyu med na mi 'bab go/ sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs ba rnams kyang lta nga'i kun nas snang ba'i rgya medan/ khams gsum du

mi 'bor ro// sring mo 'di lta stedaper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i mal na skyo ba dang 'bri ba red do// sring mo de bzhin dubaskal ba brgya stong dargyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang skye ba dang 'bring ched/sringamo'adit+taste dbo'an
meg ba lanam zhes mi gdags so// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs par shes par zhi ba la yang/ nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdags so// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' gang la me 'bar yang/ ma
mkha' ma des tshig par mnus so// sring mo de bzhin dug rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa 'byung yang/ rangabazhin gyis 'od gasal ba de// glo bur gyi nyon mongs bde/
kun nas nyon mongs bar byed mi nus so// sring mo'adi ltar yang gzugs kyi sa la ngaltar blta bar bya/ bu mos sas pa/ 'jam dpal dareb na/ mtsho bran gyi chab nangagachu zla bzhin du'o// 'jamadabal
sa skyas ba/ bu mo phung bo rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bumos smras pa// 'jam dang la dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul bzhin du 'o// 'jam dpal gyisagasab/ bu mo khams rnamI/
ji ltar blta bar bya/ bumosasas ba/ 'jam dpal dperan/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mes sregabar gyur ba de bzhin du'o/'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bu mo skyemached rnamasajaltarab lta
bar bya/ bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngonapar 'dusamabagyis pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis sbas ba/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/
bumos sbas pa/ 'jam dbal dper na/ 'khor 'dani stong gi namamakha'imatshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpalagyis sbas pa/ bumo khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bumos sa ba/ 'jam dbal
dper na/ bdug pa dngam gnyis phrad pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsakhaM/ bu mo nga ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jamadapal dpengan/ long ba gzugs la lta ba bzhi'i du'og
'jam dbalagyis sbas pa/ bu mo khyed kyis 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sbyam sprul ba'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bu s zlos lags so// 'jam dpal gyis/
thub/ @#// sus pa/ bu mo khyed kyis nad ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ yang 'adod par mi
bgyid// 'jam dpal gyisilcas pa/ bumo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i ba'olatu phyin baspyadadam/ bumos sas pa/ 'jamadapal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtam du yongs su btang
bas spyad lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bumo khyodakyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs bar byas sam/ bu mosasas ba/ 'jam dpalanamamakha'
yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bumo khyod kyisabazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal
sems can thams cad skye bam mchis pa dang/ 'byung bamamachis pas bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bumo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rolatu phyin pa brtsams sam/
klu: bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis brtsams lagaso/ 'jamadapal gyis smras pa// bu mokhyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu zhi pa la
gzhas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dbalachos thams cad kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas lags so// 'jam dpalagyis sas ba/ bumo khyodakyis shes
rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dang la lhagachadamamachis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis/
snyas pa/ bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos skyas dang/ 'jam dpal sems na thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
bu mo bya chub sems pa'i snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bumos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dbas gang sngon po ni sems thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las
btsal bar bgyi'o/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ gal tesems can rnasas kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis pagyuran/ byang chub semasadapa'am bamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du// 'jam dpal gyis sbas ba/ bumo byang chub sems dpa'i dga' bgalas brtsal b.rab/ bumos sas pa/ lhagapa'i bsams pad ldan pa'i byang chub kyi
soms lags so// 'jam dpalagyis sa pa/ bu mo bya chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras ba/ 'jam dpal byang chub semasadapa'i btang snyoms// sems
thams cad mibaslab yongs su rdzogs bar brgyade ba dang/ chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis pasanye bar mtshibar bgyidaba'o// 'jam dpal gyisasas pa/ bu mi 'gal bzhes bgyi ba
lta bu yin/ bumosasmras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'inyon mongs pa rnams spangaba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go/ 'jam dang lagyis sAs pa/ de
dag gang dang 'gal/ bumosasmas pa/ phas kyasi rgol ba thams cad dang ngo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bumo phas kyi rgol ba dag gang yin/ bu mos smas pa/ gang dgabazodapa'i
rlom semasakyis gzhan la rgol bdag lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo bgrod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong/ bumos sas pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis mtho
btsam pa las mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtho btsam pam mchis na/ bzod nga ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad duste/ 'jam dpel gang lasems can gang gis mtho btsam pa na/ 'khrug
pa ma mchis shing/ gnod mi bgyid padebazod pa bsgoms pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas nga/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras// 'jam dpal gang gis
kyi/ bskal pa brgyarab sags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de na khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ril bu yin/ bumos snyas pa//
'jam dpal gang gsems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing/ yul thams cad la gnod ba ma bya bste/ deni bzod pa lags bar rig par bgyi'o// 'jam dar la gyis smras pa/ bu mo joltar
na byang chub sems dpa'agayul las rnam par rgyal ba man/ bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal gachos thams cad la rnam rar 'byedakyang n danags ra lags so// 'jam dang la gyis sbas/
ba bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'badud phyir rgolab bcom pa yin/ bumo sa skyas pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang/ nyon mongs pa mumachis pa ste/ deci'i slad du zhe na/
'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams a ston kyang/ phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lcan cigami gnas pa dang/ 'jam dpal byang chub semasadapa'anitonamongs pa rnams nyon/
kyang/ rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa mamachas dad dang/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du na ba dang 'chi ba ston kyang/ chos thams
cad la 'chi'atho dang/ 'gro bamamachis par rab tu rtogasapa dang/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dgaston kyang/ phrag dog dang/ rlom sems can thams cad dang bralaba'i smad
du'o 'jam dpal gyis sa pa// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su par byed/ bumos smras pa// 'jam dang la byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang/ thabs
yongs su bsgoms pas semasacan yosasusmi'i par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dngasajaltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras
pa 'jam dpal rang gsoms dang shes pa yongs su bsgoms bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi drung duganas bar bgyi'o// 'jam dbalagyis
sa ra/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyodalachos nyan par 'dod do// bumos snyasapa/ 'jam dpal gang du bdagadang gzhan du 'dushes 'jug pa de na/ nyan par 'tshal bam lags la/ gang
lorna ba'i rnam par rig pa sarnamar ra shes pa 'jugan yang/ nyan par 'tshal ba na lags so// 'am dpal gyis sbas pa/ bumachos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bumos
snyas ba/ 'jam dpal gang gi tsherang gi lus l rmi lam gyi ma lta bu mos pa dang/ skyon bzhis del yang brag cha'i sgraskad lta bu r mos shing mos pa dang/ ma par grolo bar nga gnyis su
mibagyudab de tsam gyis na/ chos nyan par 'tshalab lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bu mo chos ji ltama'anang ra bya/ bu mos smras pa// chos la rton pa nan tan bgyidan
chos mnyan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyisabarlabs dang/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad 'tshongama'i bu mo gsaramchog
'od dbal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan ban/ 'khor de las srogachags khri sastong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod par gyur to// byang chub semasadapa'i
theg pa pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'ilcad ngamilcabargyan/ ma ba'i chos la bzod theb par gyur te// srog chags sum khri nyis stong tshosanams latshos mgardul med cing dri
ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ sumo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjes chu 'thun pa'i bzodapa thengaparagyur to// des bzod pa thob nas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkangapa la gtugs te// 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag rab tu byang du gsol/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa kun bskyedang/ 'phags pa/
ma lags ba/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'dalus 'dilas thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis sbas/
pa sring mo 'diwa ste/ mgo'i sgra 'dreg ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'areb tu 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bumo gangasams na thams cad kyi nyon mongs pagacod
pa'i phyir brtson pa don/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mo gang gis dudaga'achang ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'irab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bumo/
gang bdaganyid kyang baslab pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims 'achal pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang/ brtulo zhugs l yang dag
par sbyor bar byed pa de// byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byang bam
yig yid gyi/ bumogang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khorakhan rnam par rgyug pa'i sems rnams dbon par shes pa la 'god par byed pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung bzhes bya ba'o// kha dog
dang gzugs kyi rtags dang/ spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung bas yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang/ gang zag gzhan dga' byams pa dang/
snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge ba'irtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dang 'irab tu 'byung ba ma yinagyi/ sems can
thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byungab yin no// bdag yongs sumya nganAlas 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus ban/ byang chub sems
dpa'irab tu 'byang bam yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan lasabacu ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gnyonamong
pa zhi bar byed pa'i/ byang chub semasadapa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhib byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ring 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi sems
0 rjes su bsrung// byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sams rjes su bsrung ba// byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu'abyung ba yin no// bdag thor
bar bya ba la brtson pa na/ byang chub sems dba'arib tu 'byung ba ma yinagyi/ sems can thams cad thar par bya ba la brtson pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigau tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo
bdag 'khor bas skyo ba na/ byang chub sems dpa'irab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las grol bar bya ba la dga' bani/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba
yin no// bu mo bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba la dga' ba na byang chub semasadapa'i rab tu 'byung bam yin gyi/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad gos su rdzogs bar byed pan/ byang chub sems
dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba na/ sems can gzhan dag la snying rje che ba zhes bya ba'i tshigabla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya bden/ gzhan gyi 'khrul

pa la skyon dum blta ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhesakhyab de ni/ bdazhanagyi red la phrag dog ma byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas go// bumo rab tu 'byungab zhes bya ba
den bdagadangagazhas la gdung bamed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya bden/ gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bumorab tu 'byung bzhes bya bden
@#/ gzhan bstan bzhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo' btu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba den/ gzhan gyi skang bam gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya
ba de ni/ nyes pa thams cad las 'bad bzhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ni/ gzhan la rag las pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpas gzhan la/
'ag las par bya'o// bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa lags/ 'jam dang la gyis sbas pa// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba
ni[]tshul khrims la rag las pa yinate/ tshul khrims 'chal pa lano ba tu'abyung ba ci yang yod do// bu mo rab tu 'byang ban/ ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa yin/ brjed ngas pa lan
rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do// bu mo rab tu 'byung bas shesarab la rag las yin te/ shes rab 'chal palanarab tu 'byung bca yang med do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni/ rnam par grol ba
la rag las pa yin te/ sems rnam par ma grolob lanarab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rag las pa yin te/ rnam par grol
ba'i yi shesamathong bamed pa la rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/ bu mos pas nga/ 'jam dbal ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa ma mchis pa lags/
'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas na/ gzhan la rag las pa med pa ste/ rang gi kun shes pa'i yi shes kyisa'adigang rus pa
de bdag gis kyang shos la/ 'di gang tsa ba de/ bdag kyang stsabo zhes gzhan dag gi ngor mi blta bsan/ gzhan 'arag lasapa med pa yin no/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
sa rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam gras 'dapeshad pa na/ legs par bshadara'i phyir/ byang chub sems dba' lnga brgyas rab ng gi gos dang rgyan thams cad lus 'a sa bud
de 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur ba la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rib tu 'byung ba legs par bshad de/ bdag cag rnams
kyis kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/sa smad tshong ma'i bumo gsAr mchog 'od dang la la 'di skad ces sa so// bumo khyod rta'adi shing rta'adi
lazhonal/ cho dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la snying brtse ba'i phyi'i/ yongs su smin par gyis shig dang/ denyid kyis khyod rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyenapar rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas
skye bo phal bo che de dag 'di snyam dusams te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'dachags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gnas par ji ltar rung snyamamo/ 'donas bu mo des
skye bo phal po che de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces gsaso// grogs po dag 'dod cha/
ni dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dang 'a/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la// 'dod chags dngabacas pa 'i sems can rnams //
kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag zhe sdang dang bral ba'i byang chub semasadang 'an/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnus kyang kha sham tho ba med la/ zhe sdang
dang bcas nga'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dar 'ad/ gtamug dngabacas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas
kyang khan ma tho ba med la/ gtimug dang bcas ba'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag nyon mongs pa dgrol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'an/ nyon mongs pa dang
klu bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang khanam tho bamedal/ nyon mongs ba dang bcas ba'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byedado// grogs bo dag 'di'i skye dang ran/
mnabu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags bamed do// grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang/ sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu gnasakyang chags pa mod do//
sa grogs po dag 'di'i skye dper na/ bcings pa las grol bzhi'i dod chags kyis kun tu spyad pa la mi sbyod do// grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'ayang/ khan
gsum thams cad 'tshong ba dang/ 'obs lta bu 'du shes pas chags pa med do// de nasasmad 'tshongama'i bumogasar mchog 'od dang la chos kyi 'babastegs suyu zhugs/ gting
nared/ thang lan phyon/ marag pa'amun pa dang bral te/ sradipa'i skyon gyi nyon mongs pa 'jigs bar blta ba'i legs rar mthong nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa
lamago bos phyaga'atshal te/ lanagasumadubaskor ba byas nas/ shing rta la zhonakar tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag skyasaso// rang bzhin rnam dag chags bsam gas shing// rtag tu
byams sems ldang bas snang ba med// shes rab snang shagatimug rmongs bralag/ nyon mongasamed par shang rta bzho bar bya// gang gis sngon chadabadagan rgya'agyur cing// nor chags
tshong dpon bu dang lhan tsag tu// shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshul song ba// 'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang du song// jaltarasprin tshogs stug pos sa khebs na// nyi ma'i 'od zer lham
ma lhan nemin// na kyang 'od zer de dag gam 'gro// sgran gyis bsgribs pasasang bamed zad// de bzhinyon mongasabasgribs pasabyas pa kun// shes rab snangal blo med pa
yang shes rab yul gang na yang gnas pa med// nyon mongs yongs su shes pas shes rab snang// nyon mongs gang nas 'ong ba'angam yinazhing/ yul gyi
phyogs char 'gro ba'ang ma yin te// tshul bzhin ma yin pa lasanyon mongs 'byung// tshul bzhin gyis na de dag 'byungam 'gyur// bor ba med cing blangs pa'ang yodaman// bskyed pa
med cing bkag pa'ang yodam yin// gzhan la mkhyenaphrogs pa'ang ma yin te// chos mnyam nyid kyis bdagakyang nan b.radag/ 'brumar skyonam mun ba'aphyang ba na// mun pa phyogs
su song ba med pa ltar// shes rab kyis mun batshad gyur na// 'onamos zadagyu med cing 'byang bar da// dzaltar sman pas nad bgaso ba na// de yi khams ni 'jigs raram byed kyang/
de yi glo bur nad zhi bar 'gyur// nad rnams gzhan yang 'byung bamed pa ltar// de bzhin snyan pa'i dam pa 'jam dbyangs kyis// rig pa'atshul mkhyen sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sems
na nyon mongs ltebar zhi mdzod kyang// chos rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pamed// zung bo 'di dang khams rnams 'di dag dang// skye mched 'di rnams gzhan du 'gyur ba med// gang
dag sngon chadanyesaldan dugabacas ba// de dag da na dugamed 'gyur ba med// denas smad tshong ma'i bu mogs mchog 'od dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag snasanas/ yang 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang dmago bos phyag 'tshal te/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tushing rta la zhon te
